snippet: Despite the ebbing of the financial crisis, many small businesses are still unable to get traditional bank loans. But there are several alternative, though expensive, lending sources.
abstract: Many small businesses are still unable to get traditional bank loans, despite the ebbing of the financial crisis; guide is presented for several alternative, though expensive, lending sources.
lead_paragraph: Despite the ebbing of the financial crisis, many small businesses are still unable to get traditional bank loans. But there are several alternative, though expensive, lending sources.

headline.seo: For Small Businesses, Bank Loan Alternatives
headline.main: When Banks Won’t Lend, There Are Alternatives, Though Often Expensive
headline.print_headline: When Banks Won’t Lend, There Are Alternatives, Though Often Expensive
